attributes.action: Stop giving money to failing banks and pay off the off tax payers mortgages to stimulate spending
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you paid off the average working mans motgage he would have money to spend instantly.
Thus giving the economy an instant boost.
Giving money to bail failing Banks who have gambled and lost our money is not an option any longer, and bonus payments to these greedy failing Bankers must also cease immediately

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
